results.title: Fundamentals of squash: Basic shots & tactics
results.brief_description: Emphasizes the importance of controlling the centre court position and the awareness of position in relation to one’s opponent. Demonstrates the cross-court angle, corner drop, and lob shots.

results.title: Fundamentals of carrier telephony. Pt 1.  Principles and applications
results.brief_description: Explains the use of carrier telephoning to increase the number of telephone channels on a single wire without the extra cost of wires etc. Using diagrams it shows how four voices can use the same wires without interference to each user.

results.title: Using your voice
results.creator_credit: Centron Productions and Young America Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Speech”
The film is directed at the problem of common speech or voice faults in both formal and informal speaking. Shows how to make the most of your voice in everyday life situations. Points out that most speech faults are due purely to carelessness and then demonstrates and explains how to correct such faults.

results.title: Stage fright and what to do
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Speech”.
Analyzes the causes of stage fright and shows how an inexperienced public speaker can overcome it in the following ways: Realise that someone in the audience is interested your experiences; prepare the speech, using examples, stories, reasons and conclusions; practise the presentation of the speech; speak directly to friendly members of the audience; ignore small mistakes; concentrate on what is to be said, not on how it is presented.

results.title: Conducting a meeting
results.creator_credit: Centron Productions and Young America Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Speech”.
A group of adults, all talking at once, are involved in a discussion. Suddenly a voice calls the group to order and advises them on the correct way to hold a meeting. Parliamentary rules of procedure and the order of business are demonstrated from the first call to order to the final adjournment. Review of important features of meeting at end.

results.title: Eat to live
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Review: 27th year”.
Food has alway’s been man’s first preoccupation. Today, while many people get too little of the foods necessary for good health, others of us are overweight through eating too much food that has little or no nutritional value

results.title: Say English cheese
results.brief_description:
Episode number 10 of Series “Review: 27th year”.
Cheese making today is an industry, but still a craft. And English cheeses are now better value than ever, in price and nutritional value. From the series “Review No 10 - 27th year (635)”.
